channel.title: Jagex Smartened Up
channel.description:
After a long time of botting, Jagex finally caught on to me :P
Here's a list of my reset:
[ul][li]Attack from 80 to 75[/li] [li]Hitp- I mean Constitution from 83 to 79[/li] [li]Strength from 88 to 73[/li] [li]Defense from 80 to 75[/li] [li]Range and [b]prayer[/b] from 65 to 60[/li] [li]Fishing from 80 to 72[/li] [li]Thieving from 79 to 10[/li] [li]Crafting from 61 to 10[/li] [li]Magic from 96 to 82[/li] [li]Fletching from 99 to 98 (with 7k exp to 99, about to get 99 again)[/li] [li]Woocutting from 94 to 75[/li] [li]Runecrafting from 45 to 10[/li] [li]Slayer from 42 to 38[/li] [li]Hunter from 48 to 36[/li] [li]Farming from 52 to 10[/li] [li]Dungeoneering from 36 to 10[/li] [li]Summoning from 42 to 37[/li][/ul]
I know I deserved most of them, but some of them are rather interesting. The ones that I never botted are Summoning, dungeoneering, farming, hunter, slayer, prayer. Losing 5 prayer levels is a pain, it's so expensive.
Other than the skills I lost in those 6, most of them are justified. I'm actually not very angry or upset. I don't care about any of them except prayer and magic lol.
Should I make an appeal for the 6 stats?

item.title: Jagex Smartened Up
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“SunSpec221, post:41, topic:373523”]I’m bot mage…
fuck the non-botting age :D[/quote]
Then Jagex will rage
and take you off their web-page.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Smartened Up
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:39, topic:373523”][quote author=Sanskrit link=topic=469535.msg3436039#msg3436039 date=1292773339]
Superheating- https://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?key=ptVZ5P-Qky2siQk1pzuMdEQ#gid=0 , somedays you make profit

Alching gold bracelets- buy the bars, make them into bracelets, alch for profit

Stun- Requires level 80, but you can easily bot it in your POH by stunning an elemental balance. The cool thing is that you can stun and alch at the same time (there are bots for this method too) for huge xp gains. This loses more money than the above two, but the money loss adds up to about the same amount as if you had bought natures and alchables off the grand exchange (your losing the same amount of money, just earning xp faster.)
[/quote]
Wow thank you.[/quote]

Np I used most of these getting 92 mage on my account ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Smartened Up
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:35, topic:373523”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=469535.msg3434630#msg3434630 date=1292658865]

I’m not surprised they lowered the stats you played fair in. Most likely, you used money you got from botting to aid you in those skills, so they deserved to be lowered none the less.
[/quote]I haven’t made any money from botting… more like lost 10m on mage.

Should’ ve used a different magic training method lol[/quote]

What do you recommend because i want 85 mage by christmas.

Read full topic

Ivy’s = No Money
Fishing I made a few mil, but I lost more on magic[/quote]
Which partially proves Lin’s point.

P.S: I use ArbiBots, Paid Bots.

item.title: Jagex Smartened Up
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:25, topic:373523”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=469535.msg3434028#msg3434028 date=1292602499]
I can’t believe they reset now instead of banning. And what’s worse is people still complain about the reset! Back in the day, they would just perm ban you on suspicion of botting and there was no such thing as ‘black marks’ or an appeal system, when you tried to log in and it said you were banned, you were just done for.
[/quote]I’m glad they don’t do that anymore :|[/quote]

Agreed

Read full topic
